## Environment Variables

### PowerShell
```powershell
$env:API_URL = "https://dwdvyciqr7.execute-api.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/prod"
$env:TEST_ADMIN_TOKEN = "<Bernie's ID Token>"
$env:TEST_USER_TOKEN = "<BlytheLove's ID Token>"
```

### Bash/Linux
```bash
export API_URL="https://dwdvyciqr7.execute-api.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/prod"
export TEST_ADMIN_TOKEN="<Bernie's ID Token>"
export TEST_USER_TOKEN="<BlytheLove's ID Token>"
```

## Running Tests

### Integration Tests
```powershell
cd tests/integration
npm install
npm test
```

### Contract Tests
```powershell
cd tests/contract
npm install
npm test
```

### All Tests
```powershell
.\scripts\run-all-tests.ps1
```

## Notes

- Tokens expire after 1 hour
- Regenerate tokens using: `.\scripts\get-test-tokens.ps1 -Username <username> -Password <password>`
- Current environment variables are already set in this PowerShell session
- For new sessions, run the environment variable commands above
